title: (x) Chanel �go�ste - custom designed {James}
content:
Hello,   
Untraceable on myfonts. An idea ?   
Thx   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050817081437im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/40698.gif)
author: case

comments.content: [AtBrazilia](http://web.archive.org/web/20050817081437/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/atbrazilia/atbrazilia-seven/testdrive.html?s=EGOISTE&p=48) comes close but dare I say it's custom?
I would say [Bitstream Engravers Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20050817081437/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/engravers-gothic/). It's like Copperplate Gothic Sans

I disagree about Gotham. The S isn't flat (wide) enough.   
Gotham is quite regularly geometric, wheras this sample is noticeably wider/flatter. True, it could have been graphically widened, but Engravers Gothic already seems like it has the right shape, in my opinion.

Hmm, you're right, Mike: it's not Gotham...   
   
but it's not Engraver's Gothic either. Neither font has an M that descends to the baseline like this M does.
I think this is likely to be something custom, modeled after the classic Chanel logotype. I seem to recall hearing about it, not sure though.
From what I see from many years, in Paris, its a custom all caps only font.
